channel.title: NPC Definitions [Dementhium]
channel.description: How do NPC definitions work on Dementhium? Is it like a batch file or what? I've tried working with the .xml documents by editing on notepad but it seems to haven effect in-game so I was just wondering ^^ Help is appreciated.

item.title: NPC Definitions [Dementhium]
item.dc:creator: @xJavac xJavac
item.description:
@xJavac wrote:

Yea, it is. make a batch making java load NPCDefinitions in your src/org/dementhium/tools/NPCDefinitions =d.

Read full topic
